page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My family come from different parts of Lancashire.My Mother was born in Rossendale and my Dad was born in Hopwood.They met in Manchester where Dad was a telephonist and later moved to Bedfordshire when he started to work for 3M.In l974 he was promoted and moved to Chorley.When I was little he used to fly all over the world and we considered moving to America,where we spent our holidays in l983.Although he is 4l years old he has only had l0 proper birthdays.My Mother also works full-time at ROF Chorley.They both support Manchester United.I have a sister-Lisa l3 yrs old who enjoys all kinds of sports.I would like to live on a farm with a riding school or be a Mounted Policewoman.My grandparents still live in Hopwood and Rossendale. Our dog still remembers the pain of an accident and still trembles at vets.
